description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nEntrancing:
Enemies always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_DEFENSIVE}. After an enemy {ACTION_defends}, this creature afflicts them with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP}. This trait does not stack.
name: Mesmerising Lace
